Suddenly  DevilDuer saw, almost buried by the sand the pod.
  ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent=
: Friday, October 13, 2000 5:12 PM
  Subject: Re: Enemy Fire


  DevilDuer =
isn't at the battle, Alloran.

  ::Zardus/Havoc/Repressor/DevilDuer/The Obl=
itercons/Bloodystrike::

  Zardus looks around at the battle, realizing tha=
t DevilDuer, Battera, 
  Voluis, and Cybershark hadn't come back. He flies =
up, looking down at 
  Rage as the monster continues to attack his troops.
=

  "If she stays conscious, lure her to the enemy," he says into his 
  com=
m-link to Feline, about to swoop down on Deemos and Shockaract 
  when a bo=
t flies into view.

  "Who is the owner of this base?" the bot asks. He was=
 a jet. Two 
  rocket launchers along with several maching guns were mounte=
d onto 
  his wings, and his bottom had a hatch that looked like it could d=
rop 
  bombs.

  "I am," Zardus says, flying up to him and looking him over=
.

  "Good," the bot says, "My name is Havoc. Me and my troops will be 
  j=
oining you for the time being. We will need use of some facilities 
  after=
 the battle."

  Zardus nods, looking at Havoc. "Excellent.... That is the =
enemy," he 
  points down to Shockaract's group, "Except for him," he says =
as he 
  points at Burning Hammer."

  Turning around without a word, Havoc=
 dives down at Shockaract's group 
  with record speed, pulling up seconds =
before hitting the ground and 
  flying over them, missiles streaming towar=
d Shockaract. "War 
  Machines, attack the enemy," he says into his comm-li=
nk, climbing for 
  another dive.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Repressor fl=
ies into the scene, swirling around to face Shockaract's 
  group. Going fo=
rward, the chopper shoots missiles at them from side 
  mounted missile lau=
nchers, aiming at Jetstorm.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Bloodystrike ducks=
 under a shot, gaining altitude and replacing his 
  missile launcher with =
a rifle.

  He aims quickly, firing off three shots at Diskus.
  ~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Dark One swears, recieving Zardus' transmission (the one a=
bout the 
  battle). He looks at Tarantulus. "You can have this pod. But we=
 will 
  meet again."

  He takes off into the air and flies off toward the=
 Alliance base, the 
  rest of the Oblitercons following him, also having r=
ecieved Zardus' 
  transmission.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  DevilDuer fro=
wns, waiting for the pod to get done scanning. This was 
  wasting time, an=
d time was valuable right now....



  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE"=
 <thecode@p...> wrote:
  > Diskus flies straight up and avoids the missiles=
. He fires back 2 
  more
  > missiles at Hot Rod...


        eGroups Spon=
sor
